general: l_n calls the Clan to a meeting and declares (prefix)paw to be a warrior. They are now called m_c and are celebrated for their r_h.
l_n stands above the Clan and proclaims that (prefix)paw shall now be known as m_c, honoring their r_h.
c_n welcomes m_c as a new warrior, honoring their r_h.
l_n rests their muzzle on m_c's head and declares them to be a full warrior of c_n, honoring their r_h.
l_n has been following the progress of (prefix)paw for moons, and feels that it is finally time for them to get their warrior name. They are granted the name m_c in honor of their r_h.
dead_mentor: (prefix)paw stands before the leader. They should be happier, but as they're given their warrior name, m_c in honor of their r_h, they cast a look to the crowd. They wish that (mentor) could be there to see them now.
living_mentor: (mentor) sits in the crowd, chest puffed out in pride as they watch (prefix)paw be named m_c, and honored for their r_h. They consider themself lucky to have been able to train such an amazing young cat, and look forward to seeing the warrior they become.

(mentor) gives (prefix)paw a friendly nudge when the leader calls the young cat's name. They watch with pride as (prefix)paw steps forward to recieve their new name, m_c, and are honored for their r_h.
adventurous: (prefix)paw sits in front of the Clan, eager to recieve their name, but their focus seems somewhere else, somewhere beyond the horizon. They barely seem to be paying attention as they're named m_c after their r_h.
altruistic: l_n gazes down proudly upon (prefix)paw. They had spent their whole apprenticeship helping the Clan, and so they are named m_c after their r_h.
ambitious: (prefix)paw's eyes gleam as they stare up at l_n, vowing silently to themself to one day be the one up there. They are named m_c after their r_h.
bloodthirsty: Although (prefix)paw's paw's eagerness to fight has left l_n a little worried before, they know that the Clan can count on (prefix)paw's bravery and sharp claws when they need them the most. In honor of their r_h, (prefix)paw is given the name m_c.
bold: (prefix)paw stands tall and puffs out their chest as l_n announces they are ready for their warrior name. They are given the name m_c after their r_h.
calm: (prefix)paw sits before the Clan, ears pricked forward and gaze calm as l_n addresses the Clan. They bow their head as they are named m_c after their r_h.
careful: (prefix)paw sits neatly in l_n as they talk about how well (prefix)paw did in their assessment. They are named m_c after their r_h.
charismatic: (prefix)paw holds their head high as l_n announces it is time for them to be given their warrior name. They are named m_c in honor of their r_h, and the Clan explodes into loud cheers for them.
childish: (prefix)paw barely seems to be paying attention, attention focused on a fluttering leaf. l_n has to repeat their name a few times before they finally pay attention long enough to give their vow. Sighing, the leader names them m_c after their r_h.

While l_n is not quite sure that (prefix)paw has outgrown their childish quirks and their love of pranks, they welcome them as a full warrior to the Clan and naming them m_c after their lightheartedness and r_h.
cold: (prefix)paw remains completely quiet as l_n names them m_c after their r_h. Before anyone can congratulate them, however, turns and walks away without a word to do their silent vigil.
(prefix)paw stares at l_n as they speak. l_n is sure it doesn't mean anything, but (prefix)paw's lack of enthusiasm worries them. Brushing past it, l_n gives them the name m_c after their r_h.
compassionate: (prefix)paw was so busy helping another cat they were nearly late for their own warrior ceremony. They rush to sit down, and l_n gazes proudly down at them as they name them m_c after their r_h.
l_n has an unspoken fondness for (prefix)paw, but can't help but to feel that they are too soft for a life as a warrior. Nevertheless, they name them m_c after their r_h.
confident: (prefix)paw soaks up all of the attention as they stand before their Clan, eager for their new name. l_n gives them the name m_c after their r_h.
daring: (prefix)paw looks up at the leader with pride. They knew all that hard work, proving they were the best apprentice in the Clan, was worth it, even if it caused them a lot of trouble. They hold their head high as they're named m_c after their r_h.

(prefix)paw sits with a determined look on their face before the Clan, after many long moons of training. l_n is worried that their refusal to back down and jump headfirst into danger will end poorly for them, and hopes that sitting vigil overnight will change that. (prefix)paw is named m_c after their r_h.
empathetic: (prefix)paw purrs as they feel the joy and pride of their Clanmates wash over them. l_n looks down upon them, eyes glowing with pride as well as they name them m_c after their r_h.
faithful: (prefix)paw's eyes glimmer while l_n talks about their accomplishments. Their gaze isn't focused on the leader, however, but the stars shining behind them. As they are given the name m_c, they wonder if StarClan honors their r_h, too.
As l_n names (prefix)paw m_c, they swear that they see some starry cats yowling their support amongst their other Clanmates.
fierce: (prefix)paw sits in front of the leader, tail twitching back and forth as they await their warrior name. They're eager for this ceremony to be done, so they can go back out there and make sure the Clan is safe. Finally, l_n looks down upon them and names them m_c after their r_h.
insecure: Their training is done already? (prefix)paw isn't entirely sure if they're quite as ready to be a warrior as the leader claims them to be. Their voice trembles when they take their vow. As they're renamed to m_c, they in honor of their r_h, they can't help but wonder if that is truly something that describes them.
lonesome: (prefix)paw, now m_c, named so for their r_h, can only awkwardly thank their Clanmates as they weave through the crowd of purring cats. Once the meeting comes to a close, they slink out of camp to be alone for a while.
loving: (prefix)paw looks around at their Clanmates with adoration while l_n announces that their new name will be m_c after their r_h. m_c is happy to be a warrior now, but mostly they just like to celebrate with their Clan, whether it's for them or not.
l_n has an unspoken fondness for (prefix)paw, but can't help but to feel that they are too soft for a life as a warrior. Nevertheless, they name them m_c after their r_h.
loyal: (prefix)paw sits proudly in front of the Clan, their training completed. This was inevitable, of course. They could see no other path for themself than as a warrior for c_n, and they intend to do everything they can for it. They are given the name m_c, and honored for their r_h.
nervous: (prefix)paw fidgets nervously as they step forward in front of the Clan. This is an important moment, so they try not to hide their face from everyone as l_n gives them the name m_c in honor of their r_h They quickly scurry back into the crowd once the ceremony is done, silently hoping that will be the last ceremony they ever have.

As (prefix)paw nervously approaches their leader, l_n can't help but feel uncomfortable that they probably are going to be the reason of their demise someday by making them a warrior, steeling themselves they name them m_c in honor of their r_h and courage in the face of fear.
patient: (prefix)paw sits unbothered as l_n rattles on through the long, formal words of the warrior ceremony. They give (prefix)paw the name m_c, honoring their r_h. m_c has no complaints about the long vigil they must do that night.
playful: (prefix)paw bounces up to the front of the Clan, full of excitement. They try to at least take this somewhat seriously, but they still crack a joke over something the leader says. l_n gently scolds them for it, but can't help purring along as they name them m_c after their r_h.
responsible: (prefix)paw has shown more maturity than most cats their age, always offering to take on the worst apprentice jobs first, and counting the prey in the pile to know just how much to catch on patrol. l_n was tempted to make them a warrior sooner, but now will have to do. They name them m_c after their r_h.
righteous: (prefix)paw stands tall before the Clan, gaze determined as l_n says they are ready for their warrior name. (prefix)paw takes the vow seriously, and promises to always do what is best for everyone. Gaze proud, l_n names them m_c after their r_h.
shameless: (prefix)paw is still messy after tussling with someone else, and doesn't even bother to groom themself before trotting up to the front of the crowd. They are named m_c, and honored for their r_h.
sneaky: (prefix)paw's are silent as they pad forward to stand in front of the leader. They remain just as quiet as their steps as l_n names them m_c in honor of their r_h.
strange: (prefix)paw is nearly late for their ceremony, having been double checking something for reasons no one knows. l_n remains patient as (prefix)paw sits down in front of them. l_n names them m_c, honoring their r_h.
strict: (prefix)paw grumbles to themself as l_n changes just a single word in the ceremony, but knows better than to correct them during such an important ceremony. They can speak to l_n about it later. For now, they listen as they are given the name m_c, and are honored for their r_h.
thoughtful: l_n hops up onto the meeting spot to find that (prefix)paw has set moss along it in preparation for the meeting so that l_n can be more comfortable through the long ceremony. Purring, l_n gives them the name m_c for their r_h.
l_n almost feels intimidated by the knowledge (prefix)paw has gathered in their months of training and feels confident when they name them m_c in honor of their r_h.
troublesome: (prefix)paw's penchant for getting into, and even starting, trouble has almost made l_n hold back on making them a warrior. However, l_n can tell that (prefix)paw has been trying really hard lately, to make up for it, and it would feel cruel to make them wait any longer. So, l_n names them m_c in honor of their r_h.
vengeful: As (prefix)paw takes their vow and is named m_c after their r_h, their thoughts are less on protecting the Clan, and more so on ensuring that anyone who harms it will pay in kind.
wise: (prefix)paw's advice has helped many cats throughout their days as an apprentice. Even l_n has sought them out at times. l_n has no doubts in their mind that (prefix)paw is ready to be a warrior, and names them m_c, honoring their their r_h.
l_n almost feels intimidated by the knowledge (prefix)paw has gathered in their months of training and feels confident when they name them m_c in honor of their r_h.

general: c_n welcomes m_c as a new warrior, honoring their r_h.

c_n rallies around (prefix)paw in celebration. Even without a leader, life must go on, and (prefix)paw has proven they are ready for their warrior name. (prefix)paw is allowed to choose their own suffix, and they name themself m_c. The Clan cheers for the new warrior, honoring their r_h.

(prefix)paw sits with their Clan, purring as they're congratulated on finishing their training. When given the option to choose their name, however, (prefix)paw can't really think of a suffix, and asks their Clanmates for some suggestions. After hearing a few ideas, (prefix)paw decides to be named m_c. The Clan cheers their new name, and honors them for their r_h.
dead_mentor: Leader or no leader, c_n needs more warriors, and (prefix)paw has been working incredibly hard lately. The Clan agrees that they should be made a warrior. As they are named m_c, honoring their r_h, m_c wishes that (mentor) could be there to see them.

They don't care if there's no leader, the Clan knows that (prefix)paw is deserving of their full name. They gather to hold a ceremony for (prefix)paw, and name them m_c, honoring their r_h. m_c is proud of themself, though apart of them still wises that (mentor) was still there to see them.
living_mentor: Leader or no leader, c_n needs more warriors, and (prefix)paw has been working incredibly hard lately. The Clan agrees that they should be made a warrior. They gather around the apprentice, and (mentor) is nudged forward to do the honor of giving them their name. Purring in pride for their apprentice, (mentor) rests their muzzle on (prefix)paw's head, and names them m_c, honoring their r_h.

They don't care if there's no leader, (mentor) knows that (prefix)paw is deserving of their full name. They gather the Clan themself to hold a ceremony for (prefix)paw, and name them m_c, honoring their r_h.

alive: p1 can hardly believe how quickly time has passed since (prefix)paw was a kit. It still feels like just yesterday that they were tumbling around the nursery, chasing after a mossball or some other cat's tail. Misty-eyed with pride and joy, p1 throws their head back and tries to cheer the loudest as (prefix)paw is named m_c and honored for their r_h.
As the Clan cheers for the new warrior, m_c, p1 purrs loudly. Their kit is finally a warrior! A new journey has begun for m_c, and p1 knows that m_c's r_h will lead them through anything.

p2 can hardly believe how quickly time has passed since (prefix)paw was a kit. It still feels like just yesterday that they were tumbling around the nursery, chasing after a mossball or some other cat's tail. Misty-eyed with pride and joy, p2 throws their head back and tries to cheer the loudest as (prefix)paw is named m_c and honored for their r_h.
As the Clan cheers for the new warrior, m_c, p2 purrs loudly. Their kit is finally a warrior! A new journey has begun for m_c, and p2 knows that m_c's r_h will lead them through anything.
p1 and p2's eyes meet, and they purr with pride as (prefix)paw steps forward to recieve their new name, m_c, and are honored for their r_h.
dead: Are p1 and p2 watching from StarClan, (prefix)paw wonders as they step in front of the Clan. They hope so. They truly do. As they are given the name m_c in honor of their r_h, m_c hopes that their parents are there, cheering with their Clanmates in the stars for their kit.

(prefix)paw tries to keep their head high as they step forward, and are given the name m_c in honor of their r_h. It doesn't seem fair. p1 and p2 should be here with them! They promised they would! m_c looks to the stars, and their anger and frustration vanishes. It feels as though the stars are brighter, and they know that, even if they cannot be there in body, their parents are there in spirit.

general: m_c has reached the age of six moons and has been made an apprentice, with (mentor) as their mentor.
Newly-made apprentice, m_c, touches noses with their new mentor, (mentor).
m_c carefully touches noses with their new mentor, (mentor), looking quite intimidated and nervous.
m_c excitedly touches noses with their new mentor, (mentor), looking quite eager to start training.
m_c strides up to their new mentor, looking very proud and excited that they were apprenticed to (mentor).
In their eagerness, m_c accidentally shoves their nose into (mentor)'s so hard that (mentor) flinches back in surprise. m_c sheepishly apologizes, and the two have a good laugh about it.
(mentor) sees how nervous m_c is and whispers a quiet encouragement to them as they touch noses, promising to be a good mentor to them.
m_c touches noses with (mentor), wondering if this is truly the right path for them or not.
m_c remains calm as they touch noses with (mentor), but their twitching tail gives away how excited they truly are.
m_c can't seem to sit still as they bounce up to touch noses with (mentor), swearing they'll be the best warrior the Clan has ever seen.
m_c sits up straighter as they're called forward to be made an apprentice. While they try to look calm and collected, they still tremble a bit as they touch noses with (mentor).
Almost immediately after m_c touches noses with (mentor), they start asking about when they're going to go out and explore the territory.
m_c fidgets impatiently beside (mentor) as they wait for the meeting to end. They're finally an apprentice! They want to hurry up, get out there, and go, go, go!
Surprising (mentor), the first thing that m_c asks to do once the meeting ends is gather moss so everyone has fresh bedding.
m_c touches noses with (mentor) and hopes that they'll get to hunt first, so they can make sure the Clan is fed.
Eager to learn the best ways to help their Clan thrive, m_c excitedly touches noses with (mentor).

As m_c touches noses with (mentor), they hope they'll get to do something that will really impress the Clan on their first day. Maybe they could catch a big, fat, rabbit? Or chase off a fox! That'll show the Clan they're the best apprentice anyone's ever seen!
m_c sits excitedly beside (mentor) as the meeting ends, and hopes they'll be do something exciting, like battle training, first. Their claws are itching to tear at something.
As m_c touches noses with (mentor), they hope that they won't be boring and let them do something cool. Anything but gathering moss or tick duty!
m_c purrs so hard that they're shaking as they touch noses with (mentor).
m_c silently swears to StarClan to do their best for the Clan as they touch noses with (mentor).
m_c touches noses with their mentor, (mentor), looking bored and unimpressed. But on the inside, they're bouncing with euphoria around as if they were still a kit!
As their mentor is about to be chosen, m_c interrupts and announces they want their mentor to be (mentor). They stride forward with confidence to touch noses with (mentor) when it's allowed.
Newly apprenticed m_c can't help but squeak when their mentor's name is announced, and they run with their tail tucked between their legs in embarrassment to touch noses with (mentor).

Messy as always, m_c bounds across camp to touch noses with their new mentor. (mentor) grimaces at the cold feeling of grime against their nose, but they purr anyway, not wanting to spoil m_c's excitement.

m_c has been pestering everyone for moons on when they finally get to be an apprentice, and everyone is relieved that they're finally free of the young cat's nagging... Until they start asking about when they're going to be a warrior as soon as the meeting ends.
(prefix)kit sits in front of the Clan with pride, their tiny heart beating so fast they think it might explode! They very excitedly touch noses with (mentor), happy to start their apprenticeship!
no_mentor: Newly-made apprentice, m_c wished they had someone to mentor them.
m_c isn't confident in their ability to train themself, but will try anyway.
m_c is frustrated that they don't have a mentor.
m_c isn't sure what to do without the guidance of a mentor.
abandoned: m_c is so, so very excited to finally have a mentor, solidifying them as part of the Clan. They're grateful to be here, really... but (mentor) can't replace the parent who gave them to this Clan, the parent who should've been here chanting their name.
inquisitive: m_c excitedly touches noses with their new mentor, (mentor), looking quite eager to start training.

m_c silently swears to StarClan to do their best for the Clan as they touch noses with (mentor).
m_c touches noses with their mentor, (mentor), looking bored and unimpressed. But on the inside, they're bouncing with euphoria around as if they were still a kit!

alive: p1 is watching with pride as m_c is named and given to (mentor) to apprentice under. They know that (mentor) was a good choice.

(prefix)kit loudly complains as p1 pulls them over to quickly groom their pelt. They manage to wriggle away and scurry off to the front of the crowd for their ceremony, where they are renamed to m_c and apprenticed to (mentor).

Even though they are excited to finally be made an apprentice, it takes a bit of coaxing for p1 for (prefix)kit to step forward for their ceremony. p1 watches in pride as they're named m_c, and touch noses with (mentor).
dead: m_c hopes that p1 is watching in pride from StarClan as they are apprenticed to (mentor).

m_c wishes that they could be happier about being made an apprentice as they touch noses with (mentor), but all they can think about is how much they wish that p1 was still there to chant their name with the rest of the Clan.
m_c tries to keep up a brave face as they're apprenticed to (mentor), but they keep stealing glances at the crowd, as if trying to find p1 despite knowing they're no longer with them.

m_c sits beside their new mentor, (mentor) as the meeting comes to a close. Their claws dig into the ground as they glare up at the sky, wondering why p1 couldn't be there with them at such an important moment.
m_c smiles up at the stars as they sit beside (mentor). The stars seem to shine brighter, and m_c knows it's a sign that p1 is still watching over them.

general: m_c has decided that hunting and fighting is not the way they can provide for their Clan. Instead, they have decided to serve their Clan by healing and communing with StarClan. (mentor) proudly becomes their mentor.
Interested in herbs even in their kithood, m_c is eager to be apprenticed to be apprenticed to (mentor).

Interested in all the myths and stories told by the elders and queens, m_c decides to become a medicine cat apprentice, hoping to someday speak to those gone before. (mentor) loves their determination and eagerness to learn and agrees to take them on as their apprentice.
The thought alone of fighting and hurting another cat makes m_c shiver. They decide to heal instead of fight, and (mentor) takes them under their wing.
Wanting to stand out among their Clanmates more, m_c decides to become a medicine cat, and is apprenticed to (mentor).
Worried they may not be good as a hunter or fighter, but still wanting to make their Clan proud somehow, m_c decides to become a medicine cat apprentice under (mentor).

(mentor) stands before the Clan and announces that they will not be there forever, and it time they took on an apprentice. They tell the Clan that they have chosen (prefix)kit, now m_c, to be their new apprentice.

(mentor) has no doubts in their mind of who their new apprentice will be. (prefix)kit has always been looking for an excuse to be in their den, asking endless questions about what each herb is and what it's used for. And as (mentor) announces that the newly named m_c, will be their apprentice, they see m_c's eyes shining in delight and excitement, and know they were right in choosing them.
no_mentor: Newly-made medicine cat apprentice m_c learns the way of healing through guidance from StarClan.
StarClan speaks, and has decided that the new medicine cat apprentice shall be m_c. m_c is unsure if they are ready for this role without a mentor, but the stars promise to guide them.
The Clan needs a new medicine cat, and m_c is chosen for the role. m_c is stunned that they were chosen, but agrees anyway, knowing how badly the Clan needs a medicine cat.

m_c has decided that hunting and fighting is not the way they can provide for their Clan. Instead, they have decided to serve their Clan by healing and communing with StarClan, who will be the ones to train them with the absence of a proper mentor.
Interested in herbs even in their kithood, m_c is eager to be made the new medicine cat apprentice, and learn how to heal from those who came before them.

The thought alone of fighting and hurting another cat makes m_c shiver. Knowing the Clan needs a medicine cat, they seize the chance to do good for the Clan without harming others, they take on the role of medicine cat apprentice.

Knowing the Clan is in desperate need of a medicine cat, and wanting to do something to stand out and do something more important, m_c announces mid-meeting that they want to be the new medicine cat apprentice.
Worried they may not be good as a hunter or fighter, but still wanting to make their Clan proud somehow, m_c decides to become a medicine cat, and is trained by StarClan.

general: m_c feel sick at the mere thought of fighting. They decide to train as a mediator, and (mentor) is named as their mentor.
m_c is fascinated by (mentor)'s ability to solve disputes without tooth or claw. They are eager to learn, and (mentor) take them under their wing.
m_c feel sick at the mere thought of fighting. They decide to train as a mediator, and (mentor) is named as their mentor.
m_c is fascinated by (mentor)'s ability to solve disputes without tooth or claw. They are eager to learn, and (mentor) take them under their wing.

dead_mentor: As (prefix)paw is given their full name of m_c, and welcomed as the new medicine cat of the Clan, they look to the stars and hope that {dead_mentor.name} will be there with the rest of StarClan in their dreams.

(prefix)paw still can't believe that their mentor is gone. They don't feel ready to heal the Clan, and so politely decline being given a name yet. However, as they visit StarClan that half moon, {dead_mentor.name} appears to them in a dream. They assure (prefix)paw that they'll be alright without them, and that they are ready for their full name. Resting their muzzle on (prefix)paw's head, {dead_mentor.name} names them m_c.
living_mentor: Whisperings on the wind tickle at (mentor)'s ears as they gaze up to the stars, an echo rolling smoothly off their tongue. StarClan blesses m_c and welcomes them!

With the stars softly shining and lighting their pelts, the senior medicine cat gives (prefix)paw their full name of m_c. They both share the rest of the night with StarClan, celebrating their good fortune in having another medicine cat.
Inspired by (prefix)paw's boundless energy and courage, (mentor) names them m_c, and welcomes them as a full medicine cat.

Having finally reached the end of their apprenticeship, newly named medicine cat, m_c, feels there's still so much to learn, and frets about whether or not they are ready. With twitching whiskers, (mentor) assures them that StarClan will always be there to guide them.

(mentor) still remembers when (prefix)paw was just a kit, batting around in the medicine den, and asking endless questions about everything under the sun. Even now they ask why their new name, m_c, was chosen with shining eyes and twitching whiskers.
no_mentor: (prefix)paw is taken to speak with StarClan. They are given the name m_c and are now a full medicine cat of the Clan.

The time has come for (prefix)paw to be given their full medicine cat name. (prefix)paw requests that one of the other Clans' medicicine cats name them. The eldest of the medicine cats steps forward and gives (prefix)paw the name m_c.
With their training complete, StarClan decides to allow (prefix)paw to choose their own name. They name themself m_c, and return to the Clan the next morning as a full medicine cat.
